data.text: @smilearora09 Hola, we sent you a message regarding your case with a positive answer, please contact us there if you have any doubt. Regards.
@xu_dake You're welcome :)
@evgenyboychuk We're deeply sorry for the delay, Evgeny. We've replied your DMs
@stuart_hill98 You're welcome :)

@jase_rn Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number (075...) and the reference numbers related to the seats purchases (07555...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@xu_dake Hola Dake, we've just replied the DM. Please check
@raphaelbarone You're welcome :)

data.text: @raphaelbarone Hola Raphael, we only operate the last flight in your booking. So you need to contact the travel agency and ask them for your British Airways and LATAM booking reference codes, in order to add bags, select seats and check-in directly with the airlines that operate the flights
@stuart_hill98 Hello Stuart, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Liam73777609 Hola Liam, thank you.
@Liam73777609 Hola Liam, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@RiMeLo86 Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@fractalseahorse Hola, you must check the luggage allowance with BA, but also we can help you from here and check this in our system. Please send us a DM with the details. Thank you.
@mr_boatshoes Hola, could you send us the details by DM please? Include your complete name and we will help you gladly. Regards.
@slalani Hola Sohail, we will check this internally and contact you as soon as possible. Thank you.
@Liam73777609 Hola Liam, Could you send us the details by DM. Did you opened a report at the airport? Please let us know. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@RiMeLo86 Hola Riaghnach, we are sorry to read this , could you please tell us by DM if you opened a complaint through Iberia and which PIR and full passenger name you have? Thanks in advance  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ianpfarrar Hola Ian, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. regards

@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana. Sentimos la incidencia presentada con tu equipaje, nuestros compañeros estan haciendo lo posible por localizarla, apenas tengamos alguna actualización te comunicamos, seguimos tu caso en Español. Agradecemos tu paciencia. Un saludo.
@Nenny28 Hola, thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards
@EloisaC67013488 Hola Eloisa, we have replied your DM. Regards

data.text: @kadielicious Hola Kaitly, we have replied your DM, we suggest you delete from the public twitter your claim information. Kind regards

@stephylove0414 Hola Stephanie, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@kadielicious Hola Kp, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your claim case number to verify the status? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@slalani Hola. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@christycruz33 Hola Christy. We have replied to your DM. Please read our comments. Regards.
@leon15_monica Hola Monica. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@charmyers_ Hola Charlie. We have replied to your DM. Regards.

@charmyers_ Hola Charlie. Could you please, provide us with your booking code via DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa), email address, and name as it appears on the booking, and ticket numbers so that we can review it? Regards.

@klqroIine Hola Penelope. We're sorry to read this. Could you please, provide us with your PIR code and full name as registered on your booking via DM ((https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI)) so that we can review it? Regards.
📢 Due to recent events, starting tomorrow we will move forward the schedule of our flight from Tel Aviv to 00:15 (local time) with arrival in Madrid at 04:40.

@EloisaC67013488 Hola EloisaC, could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@CameronRS5 Hello Audi. We are sorry about this, if you are at the airport, please consult with our colleagues at the airport desks about your booking status. 
Kind regards,

@MargoAcutePT Hola Margo. We answered your direct message informing you on how to proceed. 
Kind regards,
@westboundsigned Hola Elena, how we can help you? Please send us all the details by DM. Thank you.
@MichaelaPetty9 Hola Michaela, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@GablesGirl2022 Hola Tiff. We are sorry about this, it must be something punctual. Our colleagues at the airport will check your booking and inform you on how to proceed. We appreciate your patience. 
Kind regards,

@GablesGirl2022 Hola Tiff. Did you try using a different browser / device ? Did you try from the Iberia app? . Depending on the characteristics of your reservation, it will be available or not. If it is not, you can always check-in directly at the airport. Kind regards,

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@AmberEngineer Hola Amber. You can fill a claim  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG our Customer Service Team will review what happened and they will contact you directly with a resolution. 
Kind Regards,

@sarahlaclau Hello Sarah. Regarding your claim, it is still under review, our colleagues should provide you your respective resolution under a term of 7 to 21 days (business). We appreciate your patience. 
Kind regards,

@PrincessDuggan Hello PrincessLala. We have answered your direct message. 
Regards,
@sarahlaclau Hello Sarah. Unfortunately, your luggage has not yet been located. We're deeply sorry and really appreaciate your patience. Kind regards.
@PrincessDuggan Hola. We replied to your DM. Please review. Regards.
@TanyaKh48700934 Hola Tanya, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@PaulosPetrakos Hola Paul. The area in charge continues to search for your luggage, as soon as there is any news you will be informed via email o SMS. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
Regards.

data.text:
@lmagova Hola Luis. We understand that American Airlines is the one who assigned you the PIR code they must directly tracking your luggage.
Regards.
@christycruz33 Hola Christy, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@smaikius Hola Michele, please send us everything by DM, the PIR code, and your full name. Thank you.
@thomasd21 We have indicated how to appeal the response, via direct message. Regards.
@thomasd21 We have indicated how to file a claim, through the DM you sent us. Kind regards.

@krishh79 Hello. Please send us the PIR and the associated full name in writing in a DM. In the same way, we suggest you edit or delete the comments since they publicly expose your personal information. Kind regards.
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana. Hemos dado respuesta a tus MD's. Saludos.
@abzugly Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regards.

data.text: @abzugly Hello. If the flight is operated by Air Nostrum. You will need to verify the availability of the services directly with them. We suggest you write to them through Facebook or Twitter. Kind regards.
@thomasd21 Hello. Sorry for the delay in our response. We have already responded to the DM you sent us. Regards,

@albina_oks From social media we do not manage refunds, we are an information channel. For this reason we have escalated the case and requested details from the area in charge. As soon as we have an update we will inform you. thank you for your patience. Regards.
@ManuelMiraSous1 Thanks. We have sent you a new DM. Regards.
@albina_oks As we indicated through the DM you sent us. We are going to consult with the area in charge, as soon as they answer us we will write to you. Kind regards.

@MrsProulx Hello. Thank you for writing to us, from here we are going to help you. Please send us a direct message with the following information: Full name, reservation code and ticket number (075-23xxxxxxxx). We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@tarazata Hola. muchas gracias por tu sugerencia, de igual manera te ofrecemos una disculpa por las molestias que pudieron surgir. Saludos.
@ManuelMiraSous1 Hello. Thanks for writing to us. Please send us all the details through a DM. Kind regards.
@MarcosMac0 We have sent you a new direct message. Regards.
@kallagany Hello. We apologize for the incident with the luggage. Did you file the claim at the airport? Please let us know your PIR reference code through a DM. Kind regards.

@MarcosMac0 Hello. We are very sorry for the incident with your luggage. Did you file a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR reference code? Please let us know this information through a DM. Kind regards.
@albina_oks HEllo. We have requested some information via DM. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.

@laurpuerta Hola Laura. Lamentamos leer lo que nos dices. Para poder revisar, sería necesario conocer el código PIR de tu reporte, tu nombre como lo registraste en la reserva y tus datos de reserva. Por favor envía a través de mensaje directo (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6). Saludos.
@lmagova Hola Luis, please follow your case with AA, as they are the ones who have your PIR in their system. Thank you.
@krishh79 Hola Venkat, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you.
@JaneN0tD0e Hola Jane, we will reply to your DM. Regards.
@wigzart Hola Anson, we will contact you as soon as we have any updates. Regards.
@thomasd21 Hola Tom, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@ullman_steve Hola Steve, we received your DM, we will follow your case from there. Regards.
@novocrypto Hola, thank you for your comments and for sharing this amazing image with us. From this department we remain at your disposal in case of future queries. Kind regards.
@SusanRFajardo Hola Susan. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@helen_soraya Hola, we've replied your new DMs. Best regards

@milton15 We're deeply sorry. As we can see, 2 of your 3 bags have already been delivered. Unfortunately, we don't have an update about the missing bag. As soon as it has been located, you'll be contacted via SMS or email. Best regards
@annebalad country embassy or consulate for further information. Best regards

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @annebalad As long as you buy them after the hand luggage security check, you can bring food in your carry on. Each country has its own policy about food exit and entry, so if you plan to travel with food in your check-in bag, please contact the travel destination's /1

@ellart258 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@annebalad Hola Anne, the 23kg extra bag is a check-in baggage. It's not possible to add cabin luggage. Best regards

@anasabadelle1 Hola, the claim was submitted on july 29 and our colleagues might take up to 7 business days to get back to you. So you should receive an answer by email until august 9. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@masonmorgann Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@masonmorgann sent to. We asked for the DM, because you aren't supposed to post the PIR reference on public chats. We remain at your disposal

@masonmorgann As explained, we only cover first necessity expenses for being without luggage, such as toiletries and a few clothes. We don't cover hotel expenses, because there was no need to wait for the bag in Barcelona, as you can always provide a new temporary address for the bag to be/1
@masonmorgann need further assistance, please send us a DM with your PIR number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@masonmorgann Hola Mason, we're sorry for the inconvenience. We can only cover first necessity expenses for being without luggage, such as a few clothes and toiletries. There's no need to wait for the bag in the same city, as we can always send the bag to other travel destinations. If you /1
@yazminamoy Hola Yazmin, we are sorry to read this, you can find the contact number listed by country through this link: https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t . Regards

@bear19664fun Hola, sentimos los posibles inconvenientes ocasionados, debes dirigir tu consulta a @iberia, el perfil desde donde nos escribes es para Inglés. Entendemos que hichiste una reserva con equipaje y no se ve reflejado, necesitamos detalles por DM para comprobar. Gracias
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@valencialink Hola Charles, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
@kthshome_ Hola, thank you for your patience, ouri colleagues already replied your email with all details. Regards
@helen_soraya Hola Helen, we have replied to your direct messages. Regards.
@SusanRFajardo Susan, we recently requested an update on the case from the department in charge. We will notify you by this means as soon as we have more information. Kind regards.
@SusanRFajardo Hemos dado contestación a  tu md, saludos Susan

@kayleenguyen09 Hola Kaylee, we are going to help you from this channel. Please send us a DM( https://t.co/1OjDMNKmrm your booking code and you ticket number (075******). We remain at your disposal, regards

data.text: @f_lilika Hola Lili, we are sorry to hear this. In this case you should open a claim here https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG sending all the details about your case, including the receipts. As soon as our colleagues review your case, they will contact you. Regards

@helen_soraya Hola Helen, we are sorry to hear this. We don´t have any previous messages from you. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with all the details, including your booking code and ticket number (075*****). We remain at your disposal, regards
@Nenny28 Hola, we are going to help you. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with more details, including your reservation code and ticket number (075********). Regards
@AhmadAL3AMRY Hola, we've just replied it :)
@ncglassnyc Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
